title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Advanced Language Skills through Simulation/VR-based Computer Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively complete language tasks, including accurate spelling, with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment with team members.
Learners enhance their decision-making ability to strategically decline help requests and accept penalties during cooperative learning.
Learners develop a collaborative attitude by voluntarily performing additional tasks to improve team performance.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
